scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a wooden cross, likely representing the Crucifixion, standing on a mound of earth. A skull is visible at the base of the cross, a common symbol of Golgotha. Above the cross, a plaque with Latin inscription "INRI" is affixed, indicating "Jesus of Nazareth, King of the Jews." The background is a pinkish-red expanse, suggesting a stylized sky or backdrop, with subtle indications of a landscape. The entire image is framed within an ornamental border featuring blue and red foliate motifs.
